entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
